item.title: Is DAPT Beneficial After Valve-in-Valve TAVI?
item.description: New data suggest dual antiplatelet therapy may not be the best approach after transcatheter valve-in-valve implantation. Medscape Medical News

item.title: UK Failing Men on Prostate Cancer, Reports Warn
item.description: Experts are calling for urgent reform of prostate cancer care as new data reveal missed diagnoses and widespread treatment gaps. Medscape News UK

item.title: Doctors, Psychedelics, and the Law: Where Things Stand
